This website shows metrics related to the [Open Case Studies project (OCS)](https://www.opencasestudies.org/). 

OCS is an educational archive of data analysis guides using real-world data to help learners engage with data science and statistics topics.



This dashboard was made using the [metricminer-dashboard template](https://github.com/fhdsl/metricminer-dashboard) and [metricminer](https://hutchdatascience.org/metricminer/articles/getting-started.html).
